Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Host-guest interaction via coordination to copper-paddlewheel and hydrogen bonding

Other Information.Additional Info: Dielectric constant increased significantly with water sorption.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Preferential adsorption near copper paddlewheel and BTC linker

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, encapsulated via vapor diffusion
Other Information.Additional Info: Iodine forms a hydrophobic barrier that hinders water uptake.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Weak hydrogen bonding with framework and adjacent molecules

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, encapsulated via vapor flow
Other Information.Additional Info: Methanol increases dielectric constant moderately compared to water.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Stronger hydrophobic interaction with BTC linker compared to methanol

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, encapsulated via vapor flow
Other Information.Additional Info: Ethanol exhibits slower expulsion rate due to clustering in pores.

Sieving Mechanism: Size-dependent guest inclusion and host-guest interactions

Experimental Validation.Method: Dielectric measurements on single crystal along <100> direction
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Dielectric constant tunable between 2.8 and 55.6 at 1 MHz

Other Information.Additional Info: Transient dielectric response reveals dynamics of molecular inclusion/expulsion processes.
